# SEQ25 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 25 focuses on arrange the gardens, and the places in the gardens

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl183, apl184, apl185, apl186, apl187, apl188, apl189

## Emergent Phenomena
Gardens that extend the life of the building and provide connection to nature

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
